title: Atta Tarar, Talal Chaudhry attend funeral of Umar Cheema’s Mother
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 23 (APP): Federal Minister for Information and Broadcasting Attaullah Tarar and Minister of State for Interior Talal Chaudhry attended the funeral prayers of the mother of senior journalist Umar Cheema on Wednesday.
On the occasion, the federal ministers expressed their condolences to Umar Cheema on the passing of his mother and offered prayers for the departed soul.
“Mothers are the greatest blessing in the world,” said Attaullah Tarar.
The ministers also sympathized with the bereaved family and prayed to the Almighty to grant them courage to bear the irreparable loss.
